SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.repository.impl

Class JdbcUserRepository

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.repository.impl.JdbcUserRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserRepository
@Repository public class JdbcUserRepository extends Object implements UserRepository
JDBC implementation of the UserRepository interface. This class is responsible for all database operations related to user entities, including: - Creating new users (registration) - Retrieving user information by ID or username - Updating user information - Deleting users - Tracking login activity It uses Spring's JdbcTemplate to interact with the database, which provides: - SQL injection protection through prepared statements - Connection pooling for performance - Exception translation from JDBC exceptions to Spring's DataAccessException hierarchy The Repository annotation marks this class as a Spring Data Access Object, allowing it to be automatically discovered and injected where needed.
